metadata.title: CVE-2021-47025 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/mediatek: Always enable the clk on resumeIn mtk_iommu_runtime_resume always enable the clk, evenif m4u_dom is null. Otherwise the 'suspend' cb mightdisable the clk which is already disabled causing the warning:[    1.586104] infra_m4u already disabled[    1.586133] WARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 121 at
